NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
THATCH: What causes the <color=orange>tentacled lifeforms</color> dwelling at the core of Giant's Deep to journey all the way <color=orange>to the surface of the ocean?</color> After much research, I believe we have finally found a concrete answer to this mystery!
2
1
THATCH: The Quantum Moon visits each planet in this star system. However, when visiting a massive, ocean planet such as Giant's Deep, the gravitational forces exerted by a satellite pulls on this planet's oceans, generating strong tides.
3 2
THATCH: These tides are strong enough to <color=orange>sweep free-flowing islands towards the poles of the planet,</color> and naturally, pull these lifeforms (composed 95% of water!) to the surface of the ocean.
4
3
THATCH: This is an illuminating reminder to be conscious of our impact on the world around us; From its native life to its towering islands, we must be more mindful of how we displace and disrupt the planet, if we wish to coexist with it!
LC_G R4 2
LC_G R5 2
LC_G EX1 1
LC_G EX2 2
LC_G EX3 3
